profile.profile: Software Developer with 3 years of experience developing web applications and windows services with c#.Net as development language; with knowledges in Python, Django, PHP and frameworks like Angular, Vue and React.

jobFunctions.description: Develop REST APIs, with Windows services and web apps using Microsoft technologies.
Help to develop new functionalities and fix bugs in the platform(core of the business).
Paticipant developing a new component to process files to dispatch messages more efficiently.

jobAchievements.description: Create a service to get more efficient information about the core of the business.
Help with the architecture design of a new sms dispatch platform.
Help to introduce and apply software programming best practices in the area.

jobFunctions.description: Develop a web application to manage a domotic central and use it with a prototype made with a Raspberry Pi.
The application is able to dimmer and turn the light on/off; It can send orders to some appliance like tv and air conditioners as a remote control does.

jobAchievements.description: Learn new technologies as Python and Django.
Learn more frontend using stylus as css preprocessor.

jobFunctions.description: Develop new views and functionalities to the business main application.
Change some things in a new web site developed in wordpress.

jobAchievements.description: New knowledges in javascript using Telerik Kendo and JSON.
Learn to develop Stored Procedures in SQL Server.
